content: This is mainly for you more experienced people out there (that's PC-talk for "old farts"). I've been wondering, does this happen every time your government switches from Democrat to Republican and vice versa? From here, halfway across the globe, it looks like everything's gone upside down, even on this very forum. I know it's none of my business - I'm just curious. The tinfoil hats changed places (mass media, and on this forum), the bashing of the administration and criticism of unconstructive bashing (especially on this forum), distrust of government - everything just switched sides so smoothly I have to think it's just something you are used to. Is it something that comes with a two-party system?

Then there are those who don't care who is in power it is the governments fault. The first category is by far the largest.
